description:
Carson's favorite part of his body are his calves.

"People say the look like bowling pins," he told us in his tell-tale Southern accent.

He does have nice legs. Thick, muscular, and hairy, topped off by a nice furry bubble butt. He's also got a nice thick pubic bush!

Carson is 21 and straight, but single.

And he loves to play soccer!

We asked him: "If the world were full of people just like you what kind of world would it be?"

I loved his response.

"Chaotic," he said. "All we would do is drink, play football and soccer, and party!"
title: Carson
